title: Radio: UX keep it simple
code:
<gds-radio-group label="How do you get your income?">
  <gds-radio label="Employment" value="1"></gds-radio>
  <gds-radio label="Own employment" value="2"></gds-radio>
  <gds-radio label="Temporary employment" value="3"></gds-radio>
  <gds-radio label="Pension" value="4"></gds-radio>
  <gds-radio label="Other income" value="5" checked></gds-radio>
</gds-radio-group>
